mapper.insert: insert into shopping_user(id, username, email, phone_number, password) values(shopping_user_seq.nextval, #{username}, #{email}, #{phone_number}, #{password})
mapper.update: update shopping_user set password = #{password} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into receiving_address(id, user_id, consignee, where_city, street_address, postal_code, phone_number) values(receiving_address_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{consignee}, #{whereCity}, #{streetAddress}, #{postalCode}, #{phoneNumber})
mapper.select: select r.id address_id, r.consignee address_name, v.id order_id, v.price order_price, v.payment_mode order_pay, v.creation_time order_time, v.state order_state from vip_orderlist v join receiving_address r on v.address_id = r.id where v.user_id = #{userId}

select r.id address_id, r.consignee address_name, r.phone_number address_phone, r.where_city address_city, r.street_address address_street, r.postal_code address_code, v.id order_id, v.order_number order_num, v.commodity order_name, v.price order_price, v.business order_business, v.payment_mode order_pay, v.state order_state from vip_orderlist v join receiving_address r on v.address_id = r.id where v.id = #{id}
